title: I Am Sent to Relieve Mankind of a Nightmare (Ich bin gesandt ...) from Potsdamer Platz oder Die Nächte des neuen Messias. Ekstatische Visionen (Potsdamer Platz or The Nights of the New Messiah. Ecstatic Visions)
medium: Photolithographic reproduction from an illustrated book with 10 photolithographic reproductions after pen and ink drawings (including title page, end papers, and colophon)
